Name: Absorber Shield
Activate: Block 1 Dmg. Store 1E if you take Dmg.
Overcharge: Block all Dmg. Store 1E per Dmg Blocked. Disable Shield 1 round

Name: Efficient Shield
Activate: Block Dmg for an additional 1E per Dmg Blocked
Overcharge: Block all Dmg. Disable shield for 1 round.

Name: Negator Shield
Activate: Block 2 Dmg. Drain 1E from attacker per Dmg blocked.
Overcharge: Block 3 Dmg. Disable Lazor of one attacker for 1 round.

Name: Negator Shield

Name: Reflector Shield
Activate: Block 1 Dmg. Spend 1E per unblocked Dmg to also damage attacker.
Overcharge: Reflect all Dmg taken to a single target. Disable Shield 1 round.

Name: Ultra Shield
Activate: Block 1 Dmg. Block additional Dmg the cost of 1E per Dmg blocked.
Overcharge: Block all Dmg. On your next BINGO roll, choose result for one die. Disabled shield for 1 round.
